channel.title: [PI] making a "C.message()" only send once? repping
channel.description: Hey, I added an npc where as certain health it will switch attacks but every time it uses that attack it sends a message such as "Nex has drained your lifepoints!" over and over? Is there a piece of code which i could add? Thanks.

item.title: [PI] making a "C.message()" only send once? repping
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Unless you have it inside a for or while loop it should only be sent once.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] making a "C.message()" only send once? repping
